TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CacheItemRemovedCallback(string key, object value, CacheItemRemovedReason reason);
.class public auto ansi sealed CacheItemRemovedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CacheItemRemovedCallback(key As String, value As Object, reason As CacheItemRemovedReason)
public delegate void CacheItemRemovedCallback(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, CacheItemRemovedReason reason);
type CacheItemRemovedCallback = delegate of string * obj * CacheItemRemovedReason -> unit

param.name: key
param.span: 從快取中移除的索引鍵。

span.span: The key that is removed from the cache.

param.name: value
param.span: 與快取中移除的索引鍵相關聯的 項目。

span.span: The item associated with the key removed from the cache.

param.name: reason
param.span: 項目從快取移除的理由，如 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 所指定的。

span.span: The reason the item was removed from the cache, as specified by the enumeration.

summary.span: 定義一個回呼 (Callback) 方法，以便在快取項目從 中被移除時，通知應用程式。

span.span: Defines a callback method for notifying applications when a cached item is removed from the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的快取中的項目指派的值會顯示使用者的頁面，並再從快取中移除項目時通知他們。The following code example demonstrates a page that shows users the value assigned to an item in the cache and then notifies them when the item is removed from the cache. 它會建立`RemovedCallback`方法，它會使用的簽章委派，會移除快取項目，並使用時，通知使用者告訴他們移除原因的列舉。It creates a `RemovedCallback` method, which uses the signature of the delegate, to notify users when the cache item is removed and uses the enumeration to tell them why it was removed. 此外，它會使用屬性將物件加入至快取，並擷取這些物件的值。In addition, it uses the property to add objects to the cache and retrieve the value of those objects. 在 `AddItemToCache`方法，它會使用方法新增至快取的項目。In the `AddItemToCache` method, it uses the method to add an item to the cache. 若要使用委派，必須使用此方法將項目新增至快取或方法，讓 ASP.NET 可以自動進行適當的方法呼叫時移除的項目。To use the delegate, you must add an item to the cache with this method or the method so that that ASP.NET can automatically make the proper method calls when the item is removed. 自訂`RemoveItemFromCache`方法會使用方法來明確地從快取中刪除項目造成`RemovedCallback`要叫用方法。The custom `RemoveItemFromCache` method uses the method to explicitly delete the item from the cache, causing the `RemovedCallback` method to be invoked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#1)]
